call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - January 16th 2025

decisions.decision: Consider 6.0 activation date in the testnet by tomorrow
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: There is one issue to be fixed and then a new release candidate can be made
decisions.quote: let's consider a 6.0 activation date in the testnet. So, yeah, maybe by tomorrow

decisions.decision: C8 will do UI for Dexy Gold
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Other options are not so viable at the moment
decisions.quote: maybe and hopefully and already pre-confirmed that C8 will do UI

commitments.commitment: Have demo for local DevNets for sub-blocks prototype
commitments.quote: maybe next week even I will have some demo for local DevNets

commitments.commitment: Do another 6.0 release candidate with public testnet activation details
commitments.quote: we can do another release candidate 6.0 release candidate with public testnet activation details

commitments.commitment: Think about mainnet activation starting from March
commitments.quote: we can think about watching mainnet activation, maybe starting from March

commitments.commitment: Test Oracle Pool transaction code in testnet
commitments.quote: I'm going to test in the testnet

open_questions.question: Who will work on the front-end for Dexy Gold
open_questions.context: Backend needs to be polished and front-end developer needs to be determined

open_questions.question: How to update the mainnet Oracle Pool
open_questions.context: After testing in testnet, need to consider mainnet pool updates

open_questions.question: What Palmyra is planning to do with Lithos Protocol
open_questions.context: Need to consider what to do with pools and get information from various teams

key_facts.fact: Dusek is doing audit on 6.0, finding and fixing issues
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Dexy Gold audit is done with all 18 contracts reviewed
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Finished code to produce needed transactions for Oracle Pool updates
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Posted Core Track roadmap based on observations and developer feedback
key_facts.speaker: kushti
